ppy/osu.summary: Recent activities in the osu repository have focused on addressing critical issues and refining game features. This includes a fix for the slider event generator incorrectly not generating repeats when tick distance is zero, rounding object coordinates to nearest integers on legacy export, and preventing a forced miss on a slider with strict tracking active if tracking is lost before the head was judged. Additionally, a change has been made to pause playback when entering gameplay test from the editor, and other minor issues have been resolved.

ppy/osu-wiki.summary: The osu-wiki repository has seen updates to various articles, including a revision to the 'Tournament drawings' page and further cleanup of the 'Chat console' article to fix typos and improve writing. These updates aim to maintain the accuracy and readability of the wiki's content, with contributors following a self-check process to ensure changes meet the required standards.
